text: Ben-Gurion University is a public university in Israel. The university was opened in 1970 in Beer Sheba next to the Soroka Medical Center. == Other websites == *Ben-Gurion University of the Negev website Category:Ben-Gurion University of the Negev Category:1970 establishments in Asia Category:Beer Sheba Category:1970s establishments in Israel
title: Ben-Gurion University of the Negev
